alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 12:48AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Showers and Isolated Thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, St. Johns, northeastern Marion, Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 1246 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a large area of rain, showers and isolated thunderstorms across the area, moving northeast at 20 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds of around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Interlachen, Pomona Park, Hastings and East Palatka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief periods of heavy rainfall may occur and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
